cards.name: Standard Node
cards.effect: Gain +2 Resilience max; provides capacity for one Workload.

cards.name: GPU Accelerator Node
cards.effect: Gives +1 SLO to any Workload it hosts; draw a card when played.

cards.name: Spot Node
cards.effect: Provides 1 capacity; if hit by an Incident discard it instead of repairing.

cards.name: Managed Control Plane
cards.effect: Unlocks playing Workloads; draw 1 card on deploy.

cards.name: High-Availability Control Plane
cards.effect: Your Resilience cannot drop below 1 while this is incident-free.

cards.name: Persistent Volume Stack
cards.effect: Each Stateful Workload you control gains +1 SLO.

cards.name: Service Mesh Gateway
cards.effect: When you play a Workload, gain 1 Resource token.

cards.name: Edge Ingress Load Balancer
cards.effect: Once per turn pay 1 Resource to draw a Commons Row card and discard it.

cards.name: Observability Stack
cards.effect: At end of turn you may peek at top card of deck; you may keep or discard.

cards.name: GitOps Pipeline
cards.effect: During Deploy you may play one additional card for 1 less Resource.

cards.name: Cluster Autoscaler
cards.effect: Gain +1 Resource during Refresh for each 2 Nodes you control.

cards.name: Disaster Recovery Plan
cards.effect: If your Resilience would drop below 0, discard this instead and set Resilience to 2.

cards.name: Stateless API Service
cards.effect: Provides +1 Resource during Refresh while incident-free.

cards.name: Event Processor Queue
cards.effect: When deployed gain 2 Resource tokens.

cards.name: Stateful Database Cluster
cards.effect: Add +1 SLO for each Persistent Volume Stack you control.

cards.name: Machine Learning Platform
cards.effect: Opponents pay +1 Resource to target you with Attacks.

cards.name: Batch ETL Pipeline
cards.effect: At end of turn you may discard 1 card to gain 2 Resources.

cards.name: Realtime Analytics Dashboard
cards.effect: When deployed draw 2 cards; keep 1 and discard the other.

cards.name: Internal Tools Suite
cards.effect: Gain +1 Resilience when deployed.

cards.name: DDoS Burst
cards.effect: Place 2 Incidents across target Nodes; they lose Resources gained this turn.

cards.name: Supply Chain Compromise
cards.effect: Steal an Automation or Upgrade card; place 1 Incident on new card.
cards.repair: Target pays 3 tokens to clear Incident

cards.name: Rogue CronJob
cards.effect: Place 1 Incident on a Workload; it provides no SLO until cleared.
cards.repair: Target pays 2 tokens to clear Incident

cards.name: Budget Freeze
cards.effect: Target skips their next Plan phase and loses 2 Resources.
cards.repair: Cannot be repaired; Incident clears automatically after skip

cards.name: Compliance Audit
cards.effect: Target must discard an Automation or reveal a hand without Attacks.

cards.name: Zombie Pod Swarm
cards.effect: Remove 1 Resilience and place an Incident on target Control Plane.
cards.repair: Target pays 3 tokens to clear Incident

cards.name: Incident Response Runbook
cards.effect: Cancel an Attack that targets you and draw a card.

cards.name: Chaos Engineering Drill
cards.effect: Remove up to 2 Incidents from your cards.

cards.name: Hotfix Brigade
cards.effect: Restore 2 Resilience.

cards.name: Blue-Green Rollout
cards.effect: Play a Workload from your discard pile for free; it gains 1 Incident.
